channel.title: 508 Colour Codes
channel.description:
Does anyone know all the colour codes, like purple and all the colours for the server. Im making a server and i wanna change the colours of the login colour and yell colour.... can you post all the colours you know[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 04, 2009, 07:49:51 am[/size][hr]508 Colour:- <col=FF00FF> - Pink <col=2E8B57> - Darky-Green <col=66FF33> - Fluro-Green <col=ff0000> - Red <col=8B0000> - Dark-Red <col=0000ff> - Blue <col=00FFF0> - Aqua <col=C12DBF> - Dark-Pink
thats all i got atm i want yellow

item.title: 508 Colour Codes
item.dc:creator: @Projext Projext
item.description:
@Projext wrote:

Tutorial: Color Codes
Needed: A Brain and Common Sense.
Difficulty: 0/10

Step 1:
Search for “HTML Color Wheel” on Google.

Step 2:
Click the top link and be amazed.

Credits 10% - Me Writing the Tutorial
Credits 90% - Website for Providing the Codes.
